articles.title: Aditya Narayan and Shweta Agarwal share baby shower pics. Fans are elated - India Today
articles.description: Aditya Narayan and Shweta Agarwal are excited to welcome their first child. The couple has now shared pictures from the baby shower.

articles.title: Salman Khan gets mobbed outside Mumbai restaurant. His reaction is epic - India Today
articles.description: Salman Khan was spotted outside an Australian restaurant in Mumbai, last evening, January 25. The actor was surrounded by fans, but it is his reaction that has our attention.
articles.content: Salman Khan has a huge fan following, which has been growing every day. Fans eagerly wait to see a glimpse of Bhaijaan. Salman was recently spotted outside a Mumbai restaurant, and fans could not kee… [+1041 chars]

articles.title: Don't Use Sidharth Shukla's Name Without Permission, Asks Family. Shehnaaz Gill Shares Statement - NDTV Movies

articles.title: Kapil Sharma says at lowest phase of his life, he decided to marry Ginni Chatrath: ‘I decided to set things right’ - The Indian Express
articles.description: Kapil Sharma will make his standup comedy debut on Friday, with his first special for Netflix, titled Kapil Sharma: I'm Not Done Yet. The actor spoke about his love story with wife Ginni Chatrath ahead of it.
articles.content: Comedian Kapil Sharma said that he never tried to pursue his wife Ginni Chatrath, even when he found out that she was attracted to him, because of their ‘class differences’. In an interview, Kapil sa… [+1745 chars]
